name: Pripyat-3
description:
"Pripyat-3" is an endless match-3 game for true connoisseurs of the genre. The player needs to make rows of useful supplies to survive until the reinforcements of friendly forces and not die from the onslaught of zombies. Various bonuses will help you clear the playing field more efficiently, but with every new level you will need more and more supplies to survive!

Game Features:
  • Endless gameplay! How far can you get?
  • Casual Match-3 for fans of the genre
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Nice soundtrack
  • Easy to learn - hard to master![/lost]
